attributes.action: make a Lotus Esprit available on the NHS as a cure for depression
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since buying a Lotus Esprit, I've not stopped grinning.  However, not everyone can afford such an effective cure for depression.  Compared to tbe cost of drugs, psychiatrists, etc., not to mention the damage to the economy due to lost time at work, this would be a very cost effective solution.  In addition, the owners' community is incredibly supportive in the unlikely event of a relapse.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
